comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST1A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEST1A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST1A model. This model represents systems in which excitation power is supplied through a transformer from the generator terminals (or the unit's auxiliary bus) and is regulated by a controlled rectifier.  The maximum exciter voltage available from such systems is directly related to the generator terminal voltage.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 7.1.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ilr
contents.comment: Exciter output current limit reference (I).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 190. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K). Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gains (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: klr
contents.comment: Exciter output current limiter gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pssin
contents.comment: Selector of the Power System Stabilizer (PSS) input (PSSin). true = PSS input (Vs) added to error signal false = PSS input (Vs) added to voltage regulator output. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: tb1
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tc1
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: uelin
contents.comment: Selector of the connection of the UEL input (UELin). Typical Value = ignoreUELsignal. Default: None

contents.name: vamax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 14.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vamin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -14.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator input limit (V).  Typical Value = 999. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator input limit (V).  Typical Value = -999. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator outputs (V).  Typical Value = 7.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator outputs (V).  Typical Value = -6.7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
